settings.heading: INSOPAINT ULTRA
settings.description: REVOLUTIONISE YOUR HOME WITH ENERGY SAVING PAINT

settings.title: World's First Genuine Insulation Paint
settings.text: Formulated with Thermilate's cutting-edge technology, this paint offers genuine insulation benefits, keeping your home comfortable and energy-efficient.

settings.title: Superior Strength and Durability
settings.text: Made with the highest quality acrylic resin, providing unparalleled strength and durability to your surfaces, ensuring long-lasting protection.

settings.title: Advanced Weather Shield Protection
settings.text: Offers exceptional weatherproofing properties, shielding your walls from extreme weather conditions, ensuring longevity and resilience.

settings.heaing: Long-lasting Protection Against Mould and Moisture
settings.title: Long-lasting Protection Against Mould and Moisture
settings.text: Provides extreme, long-lasting protection against mould, moisture, and water ingress, thanks to its high breathability and effective surface insulation.

settings.title: Significant Energy Savings
settings.text: Reduce heating and cooling costs significantly by optimising thermal insulation, helping you save money on energy bills all year round.

settings.title: Enhanced Comfort
settings.text: Enjoy a more comfortable indoor environment with stable temperatures and reduced drafts, improving overall comfort for occupants.

settings.title: Long-term Investment
settings.text: Experience premium quality without the premium price tag, thanks to our commitment to affordability and excellence.With its durable formulation and exceptional performance, InsOpaint ULTRA represents a long-term investment in your property's energy efficiency and comfort.

settings.title: Effective Mould Prevention
settings.text: Say goodbye to unsightly mould and moisture problems with InsOpaint ULTRA's effective barrier, providing long-lasting protection and peace of mind.

settings.title: Low Maintenance and Eco-friendly
settings.text: Benefit from easy-to-clean surfaces and eco-friendly water-based acrylic paint, contributing to a healthier indoor environment and reducing your carbon footprint.

settings.heading: Additives
settings.text: Our advanced additives extend the life of your paint job with robust durability and include energy-saving technology that makes InsOpaint Ultra a smart choice for thermal efficiency.

settings.heading: Pigment
settings.text: With InsOpaint Ultra, experience the depth and richness of Colour that only the highest-grade pigments can provide, ensuring a stunning and consistent aesthetic.

settings.heading: Resin
settings.text: Our premium resins create a waterproof, breathable finish that offers exceptional coverage and resistance to Mould, safeguarding your surfaces against the elements.

settings.heading: INGREDIENTS
settings.text: InsOpaint Ultra is at the forefront of paint innovation, offering an elite paint formulation at a value-focused price. We combine top-quality materials to deliver a product that provides both beauty and energy-saving benefits.

settings.title: Genuine Insulation Technology
settings.text: Utilises Thermilate's patented insulation technology to create a genuine thermal barrier on your walls, reducing heat loss and energy waste.

settings.title: Weatherproof Protection
settings.text: Offers advanced weather shield protection, guarding your walls against extreme weather conditions and maintaining structural integrity.

settings.title: Reflective Heat Management
settings.text: Reflects heat back into your rooms during winter and deflects it away during summer, optimising thermal comfort and energy efficiency.

settings.title: Mould and Moisture Resistance
settings.text: Provides long-lasting protection against mould, moisture, and water ingress, thanks to its high breathability and effective surface insulation.

settings.title: Energy-efficient Coating
settings.text: Lowers energy consumption by stabilising indoor temperatures, reducing the strain on heating and cooling systems, and cutting energy costs.

settings.title: Durable Formulation
settings.text: Made with high-quality acrylic resin for superior strength and durability, ensuring long-lasting performance and protection.

settings.title: Proven Performance
settings.text: Independently tested and proven in top laboratories worldwide, including government bodies, ensuring reliable and effective energy-saving performance.

settings.title: Trusted by Industry Leaders
settings.text: Trusted by major companies worldwide, including Coca-Cola, Rolls Royce, and IKEA, for its exceptional quality and performance.

settings.heading: PREP
settings.text: Prep your area and walls by sanding, cleaning, and ensuring the surface is smooth & dry - use primer (or mist coat) on bare surfaces or fresh plaster board

The Dual-Climate Technology

settings.heading: Winter Warmth Retention
settings.text: In winter, the paint's thermal barrier properties trap warmth within your living spaces, significantly reducing the need for constant heating and fostering a cozy, warm atmosphere.

settings.heading: Summer Heat Reflection
settings.text: Come summer, the same barrier functions in reverse, reflecting the sun's heat away from your interior spaces, keeping them cool without over reliance on air conditioning.

settings.heading: Year-Round Comfort
settings.text: This year-round temperature regulation not only enhances comfort but also means less strain on heating and cooling systems, leading to lower energy consumption and increased savings.
Advanced Mould Defence Mechanism

settings.heading: Barrier Protection
settings.text: InsOpaint ULTRA's formulation doesn't just combat mouldâ€”it prevents it. By creating a non-porous barrier, it stops moisture infiltration, the primary cause of mould growth.

settings.heading: Long-Term Solution
settings.text: This proactive approach offers a long-term solution that outperforms other paints which rely on chemical treatments that lose efficacy over time.

settings.heading: Health and Safety
settings.text: By preventing mould, InsOpaint ULTRA contributes to healthier indoor air quality, crucial for respiratory health and a safer environment for everyone.
Sustainable Science of InsOpaint ULTRA

settings.heading: Eco-Friendly Composition
settings.text: With its eco-conscious formula, InsOpaint ULTRA demonstrates our commitment to sustainability, boasting very low VOC levels and a composition that respects the environment.

settings.heading: Tested & Trusted Worldwide
settings.text: Rigorous independent testing to international standards is a testament to our paint's reliability and performance, ensuring you invest in a product that's respected globally.

settings.heading: The ULTRA Difference
settings.text: The ULTRA difference lies in its patented technology that redefines the very concept of paint. It's not just about aestheticsâ€”it's about innovation that pays for itself by lowering energy costs.

settings.heading: InsOpaint ULTRA - Embrace the Future of Insulating Paint Technology
settings.text: Don't just paint, InsOpaint! InsOpaint ULTRA ushers in a new era of painting solutions that do more than just cover your walls; they work smartly to conserve energy. This paint transforms any wall into a climate-responsive surface and works with your home, reflecting heat back indoors during the chilly winters and repelling the sun's intensity in summers. This dual action translates into a comfortable indoor environment throughout the year, and substantial savings on energy expenses. Paint, Protect & Insulate,
